short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Peg Me' helps BabyPeg members save online items & web links to their interactive checklist at babypeg.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the 'Peg Me' extension is one of the easiest & quickest ways for BabyPeg members to build a unique parenting and baby item checklist. The 'BabyPegged' checklist helps users keep track of the items they need, want & have for each age stage. When BabyPeg Members invite friends and family to view and interact with the checklist, it becomes a gift registry, unique gift inspiration & hand-me-down tool.

It's free to become a member of babypeg.com where we support an empowered, prepared and connected transition into your parent & new-baby life.

Find out more at https://www.babypeg.com
